statement_text: The department said earlier this month it was looking into vaccines as an option to protect poultry against deadly bird flu as the country faces its worst outbreak since 2015.

rationale: The phrase 'worst outbreak' uses the superlative 'worst' with the negative noun 'outbreak', fitting the Q2 pattern.
statement_text: The department said earlier this month it was looking into vaccines as an option to protect poultry against deadly bird flu as the country faces its worst outbreak since 2015.
